objects.text:
• Luxurious Eau de Toilette
• Versatile Unisex Scent
• Elegant Turquoise Design
• Long-lasting Formulation

product_details.name: BELLAVITA Fresh Unisex EDT - Captivating Freshness for All
product_details.description:
• Luxurious 100ml/3.4 fl. oz Eau de Toilette fragrance
• Versatile unisex scent suitable for all gender expressions
• Elegant turquoise bottle design with premium gold cap
• Perfect for daily wear and special occasions
• Fresh and invigorating fragrance profile
• Contemporary and sophisticated packaging
• Long-lasting eau de toilette formulation
• Ideal gift choice for fragrance enthusiasts
• Compact size perfect for travel and everyday carry
• Premium BELLAVITA® quality assurance

banner_details:
This banner presents a premium fragrance product with an elegant and modern layout divided into four quadrants. The top-left features a bold brand title ("heading"), a sleek subheading ("subheading"), an energetic tagline ("tagline"), and concise product details ("product_details"). The bottom-left quadrant lists key features ("description") as bullet points, reinforcing product appeal. The right half includes an eye-catching image of the product ("product_image"), paired with a luxurious slogan ("tagline_2"), and a prominent price tag ("price"). Below, a golden call-to-action button ("cta_button") with text ("cta") completes the purchase prompt. Design elements incorporate thin gold line motifs and subtle circle overlays for refinement.

**Color Palette:**
- Turquoise (#00B5B8)
- Deep Teal (#004445)
- Dark Cyan (#005A5B)
- Emerald Teal (#01877B)
- White (#FFFFFF)
- Gold (#D4AF37)
product_color: The product image features a vibrant, tropical-themed color palette, exuding freshness and modern elegance. The primary color is a vivid aqua teal (#00B3B3), which dominates the bottle and conveys coolness and energy. This is harmoniously contrasted with metallic gold (#D4AF37) on the cap and typography, lending a luxurious and premium feel. White (#FFFFFF) is used subtly for clarity and contrast in the text, ensuring readability. The colors are blended seamlessly, with the solid teal background highlighting the metallic and white accents, delivering a fresh, eye-catching look suitable for gender-neutral appeal. Ideal banner palettes: #00B3B3, #D4AF37, #FFFFFF, #007F80.
